Player History

to Ortiz, 2B Estanis Aguilar, RF Fred Bondurant)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 5/1/2018 (Going to BRO: P Tim Zimmermann, 2B Estanis Aguilar, LF Andre Winston, 1B Frederick Wansley, P Willie Dubois. Going to CIN: P Fernando Cantu)...
Had first career hit on 6/10/2019, off Alberto Arroyo (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/17/2019, off James Borden (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Seattle on 6/10/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2020, hitting .455 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/25/2020 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 4/6/2022 (Going to CIN: 1B Estanis Aguilar, P Pablo Martinez, P Steven Cuyler. Going to BRO: P Samuel Valenzuela, 3B Benjamin Rosato, P Donald Newton)...
